title: Portrait of a Queen
brief_description: A review of the life of HM Queen Elizabeth II. Glimpses of her early childhood, her marriage, the Coronation and other notable events, such as visits to Commonwealth and other countries overseas. The Queen as an individual, in family life. Her constitutional role as Sovereign and Head of the Commonwealth.
